API ReferenceÔÉÅ

This section provides detailed documentation of DEISM‚Äôs functions and parameters with interactive features including hover tooltips and clickable function links.

üí° Use Ctrl+K to focus search, Escape to clear

Core FunctionsÔÉÅ

DEISM-ARG Core FunctionsÔÉÅ

run_DEISM_ARG(params)ÔÉÅ

Main function to run DEISM-ARG simulation for arbitrary room geometries after the reflection paths are calculated.

Parameters:

params (dict) ‚Äì Configuration parameters dictionary

Returns:

Room transfer function results

Return type:

1D numpy.ndarray

Key Parameters Used:

  • soundSpeed - Speed of sound for wave calculations

  • DEISM_mode - Algorithm variant selection

  • numParaImages - Parallel processing batch size

  • nSourceOrder - Source directivity order

  • vReceiverOrder - Receiver directivity order

class Room_deism_cpp(params, *choose_wall_centers)ÔÉÅ

C++ accelerated room class for definition of room geometry and calculation of reflection paths.

Parameters:

  • params (dict) ‚Äì Configuration parameters

  • params["vertices"] (numpy.ndarray) ‚Äì Room vertices as Nx3 numpy array

  • params["wallCenters"] (numpy.ndarray) ‚Äì Wall center coordinates as Nx3 numpy array

  • params["acousImpend"] (numpy.ndarray) ‚Äì Acoustic impedance of walls as N * len(params[‚Äúfreqs‚Äù]) numpy array

Main Methods:

image_source_model()ÔÉÅ

Generates image sources using the image source method. Also the attenuation and reflection matrices are calculated.

Uses Parameters:

  • maxReflOrder - Maximum reflection order

  • acousImpend - Wall impedance values

  • posSource - Source position

  • posReceiver - Receiver position

Data Loading FunctionsÔÉÅ

compute_rest_params(params)ÔÉÅ

Computes derived parameters from the basic configuration parameters.

Parameters:

params (dict) ‚Äì Configuration parameters dictionary

Returns:

Updated parameters dictionary with computed values

Return type:

dict

Computed Parameters:

  • waveNumbers - Wave numbers k = 2œÄ√óf/c

  • pointSrcStrength - Source strength compensation (if ifReceiverNormalize=1)

  • cTs - Speed of sound divided by sample rate

  • n1, n2, n3 - Room dimension ratios for image source method

  • acousImpend - Reshaped impedance array (6, n_freqs)

Input Parameters:

  • soundSpeed - Speed of sound

  • airDensity - Air density

  • startFreq, endFreq, freqStep - Frequency range

  • sampleRate, RIRLength - Time domain settings

  • roomSize - Room dimensions

  • acousImpend - Wall impedance

loadSingleParam(configs, args)ÔÉÅ

Loads parameters from YAML configuration and command line arguments.

Parameters:

  • configs (dict) ‚Äì Configuration dictionary from YAML file

  • args (argparse.Namespace) ‚Äì Command line arguments

Returns:

Parameter dictionary

Return type:

dict

Maps YAML to Internal Parameters:

See Configuration Parameters for complete mapping table.

detect_conflicts(params)ÔÉÅ

Detects conflicts between parameters and issues warnings.

Parameters:

params (dict) ‚Äì Configuration parameters dictionary

Checks Parameters:

  • sourceType and nSourceOrder consistency

  • receiverType and vReceiverOrder consistency

  • Distance between posSource and posReceiver

  • freqStep recommended value (should be 2)

DEISM Algorithm FunctionsÔÉÅ

run_DEISM(params)ÔÉÅ

Initialize parameters and run DEISM calculations using selected algorithm mode.

Parameters:

params (dict) ‚Äì Configuration parameters dictionary

Returns:

Room transfer function

Return type:

numpy.ndarray

Algorithm Selection:

  • Uses DEISM_mode parameter to select: ‚ÄúORG‚Äù, ‚ÄúLC‚Äù, or ‚ÄúMIX‚Äù

  • Calls appropriate ray-based parallel computation function

pre_calc_images_src_rec_original(params)ÔÉÅ

Pre-calculates image sources using the original DEISM method.

Parameters:

params (dict) ‚Äì Configuration parameters dictionary

Returns:

Image source data

Return type:

dict

Uses Parameters:

  • roomSize - Room dimensions for image calculation

  • maxReflOrder - Maximum reflection order

  • posSource, posReceiver - Source and receiver positions

  • acousImpend - Wall impedance for reflection coefficients

pre_calc_images_src_rec_lowComplexity(params)ÔÉÅ

Pre-calculates image sources using the low-complexity method.

Uses Parameters:

  • Similar to pre_calc_images_src_rec_original but with optimized algorithms

pre_calc_images_src_rec_MIX(params)ÔÉÅ

Pre-calculates image sources for mixed mode (early + late reflections).

Uses Parameters:

  • mixEarlyOrder - Threshold for early vs late reflections

  • All parameters from original and LC methods

ray_run_DEISM(params, images, Wigner)ÔÉÅ

Run DEISM original algorithm with Ray parallel processing.

Uses Parameters:

  • numParaImages - Batch size for parallel processing

  • nSourceOrder, vReceiverOrder - Directivity orders

ray_run_DEISM_LC(params, images)ÔÉÅ

Run DEISM low-complexity algorithm with Ray parallel processing.

ray_run_DEISM_MIX(params, images, Wigner)ÔÉÅ

Run DEISM mixed algorithm with Ray parallel processing.

Configuration ParametersÔÉÅ

This section provides an interactive, comprehensive reference for all DEISM parameters with hover tooltips showing function dependencies and clickable links to relevant functions.

Environment ParametersÔÉÅ

soundSpeed

Environment
Speed of sound in air, fundamental parameter for all acoustic calculations.
YAML Path: Environment.soundSpeed
Type: float
Default: 343 m/s
Units: meters per second
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params() run_DEISM() Room_deism_cpp.__init__()

airDensity

Environment
Air density used for receiver normalization when using flow strength method.
YAML Path: Environment.airDensity
Type: float
Default: 1.2 kg/m¬≥
Units: kilograms per cubic meter
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params()

Room Geometry ParametersÔÉÅ

roomSize

Room Geometry
Room dimensions for shoebox geometries [Length, Width, Height].
YAML Path: Dimensions.[length, width, height]
Type: numpy.ndarray
Shape: (3,)
Units: meters
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params() pre_calc_images_src_rec_original() pre_calc_images_src_rec_lowComplexity() pre_calc_images_src_rec_MIX()

acousImpend

Room Geometry
Acoustic impedance of room walls. Can be uniform or frequency/wall dependent.
YAML Path: Reflections.acoustImpendence
Type: float/list/numpy.ndarray
Shape: (6, n_freqs) after processing
Units: Pa‚ãÖs/m (acoustic ohms)
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params() pre_calc_images_src_rec_original()

maxReflOrder

Room Geometry
Maximum order of reflections to consider in image source method.
YAML Path: Reflections.maxReflectionOrder
Type: int
Default: 40
Range: 1 to ~50 (higher = more accurate, slower)
Used in Functions:
pre_calc_images_src_rec_original() pre_calc_images_src_rec_lowComplexity() pre_calc_images_src_rec_MIX()

Position and Orientation ParametersÔÉÅ

posSource

Position
3D Cartesian coordinates of the sound source position.
YAML Path: Positions.source.[x, y, z]
Type: numpy.ndarray
Shape: (3,)
Units: meters
Used in Functions:
pre_calc_images_src_rec_original() detect_conflicts() run_DEISM()

posReceiver

Position
3D Cartesian coordinates of the receiver position.
YAML Path: Positions.receiver.[x, y, z]
Type: numpy.ndarray
Shape: (3,)
Units: meters
Used in Functions:
pre_calc_images_src_rec_original() detect_conflicts() run_DEISM()

Frequency ParametersÔÉÅ

startFreq

Frequency
Starting frequency for the frequency range of interest.
YAML Path: Frequencies.startFrequency
Type: float
Default: 2 Hz
Units: Hertz
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params()

endFreq

Frequency
Ending frequency for the frequency range of interest.
YAML Path: Frequencies.endFrequency
Type: float
Default: 24000 Hz
Units: Hertz
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params()

freqStep

Frequency
Frequency step size for the frequency array.
YAML Path: Frequencies.frequencyStep
Type: float
Default: 2 Hz
Units: Hertz
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params() detect_conflicts()

sampleRate

Frequency
Sampling rate for RIR generation and time-domain calculations.
YAML Path: Frequencies.samplingRate
Type: int
Default: 48000 Hz
Units: Hertz
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params()

RIRLength

Frequency
Length of Room Impulse Response in seconds.
YAML Path: RIRs.RIRLength
Type: float
Default: 1.0 seconds
Units: seconds
Used in Functions:
compute_rest_params()

Directivity ParametersÔÉÅ

sourceType

Directivity
Type of source directivity pattern (monopole or custom).
YAML Path: Directivities.source
Type: str
Options: "monopole", custom names
Default: "monopole"
Used in Functions:
detect_conflicts()

receiverType

Directivity
Type of receiver directivity pattern (monopole or custom).
YAML Path: Directivities.receiver
Type: str
Options: "monopole", custom names
Default: "monopole"
Used in Functions:
detect_conflicts()

nSourceOrder

Directivity
Maximum spherical harmonic order for source directivity expansion.
YAML Path: MaxSphDirectivityOrder.nSourceOrder
Type: int
Default: 5
Range: 0 to ~20
Used in Functions:
run_DEISM() detect_conflicts()

vReceiverOrder

Directivity
Maximum spherical harmonic order for receiver directivity expansion.
YAML Path: MaxSphDirectivityOrder.vReceiverOrder
Type: int
Default: 5
Range: 0 to ~20
Used in Functions:
run_DEISM() detect_conflicts()

DEISM Algorithm ParametersÔÉÅ

DEISM_mode

Algorithm
DEISM algorithm variant to use: Original (most accurate), LC (fastest), or MIX (balanced).
YAML Path: DEISM_specs.Mode
Type: str
Options: "ORG", "LC", "MIX"
Default: "MIX"
Used in Functions:
run_DEISM() run_DEISM_ARG()

mixEarlyOrder

Algorithm
Reflection order threshold for MIX mode (early reflections use ORG, late use LC).
YAML Path: DEISM_specs.mixEarlyOrder
Type: int
Default: 2
Range: 1 to maxReflOrder
Used in Functions:
ray_run_DEISM_MIX() pre_calc_images_src_rec_MIX()

numParaImages

Algorithm
Number of image sources to process in parallel (controls memory usage).
YAML Path: DEISM_specs.numParaImages
Type: int
Default: 50000
Range: 1000 to 100000
Used in Functions:
ray_run_DEISM() ray_run_DEISM_LC() ray_run_DEISM_MIX()

Note

Interactive Features:

  • Hover over parameter names to see function usage tooltips

  • Click function references to jump to their documentation

  • Search parameters using the search box (Ctrl+K to focus)

  • Keyboard shortcuts: Escape to clear search, Enter/Space on tooltips

Performance ConsiderationsÔÉÅ

Algorithm Selection:

  • Original (ORG): Most accurate, highest computational cost

  • LC: Fastest, good approximation for higher-order reflections

  • MIX: Balanced approach, recommended for most applications
